original_title: はじめて彼女ができたので幼なじみとSEXや中出しの練習をする事にした 本田のえる
overview: I got a girlfriend for the first time! But... I'm a virgin and I don't really know how to get along with girls! In times like this, talk to your childhood friend Noeru! Then ... "For the time being, why don't you throw away your virginity?" She doesn't want her to find out that she's a virgin and doesn't know how to do it, so she decides to practice sex! And I finally realized that I was practicing even blowjob, cunnilingus and vaginal cum shot. I…. I love Noeru! The 20th blockbuster youth love story series!
title: First Ever Girlfriend So Had SEX and Creampie Practice With my Friend. Noeru Honda
